name: KryptowireMAST
friendlyName: Kryptowire Mobile Application Security Testing Extension
description: Build Task extension for submitting the artifact file for Kryptowire analysis
author: Kryptowire-Inc

inputs.name: url
inputs.label: API URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL for the Kryptowire MAST API

inputs.name: filepath
inputs.label: File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Filepath for mobile binary to upload.

inputs.name: apikey
inputs.label: API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: API key to access the security service.

inputs.name: externalId
inputs.label: External ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The External ID to assign to this app submission

inputs.name: subgroupIds
inputs.label: Sub Group IDs
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Sub Group IDs that the mobile app belongs to.

inputs.name: scoreThreshold
inputs.label: Score Threshold
inputs.helpMarkDown: Break build on lower security score than this threshold

inputs.name: maxAnalysisTime
inputs.label: Max Analysis Time (in minutes)
inputs.helpMarkDown: This defines how long the build should wait (in minutes) to finish security analysis.
